25.ara-name: كتاب الأطعمة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik: That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Take the 'Asha' meal, even if it is just with a handful of something to fill. For indeed avoiding the 'Asha' is from senility." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Munkar, we do not know of it except from this route. 'Anbasah was graded weak is Hadith. 'Abdul-Malik bin 'Allaq is unknown

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الْعَشَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtue Of Al-'Asha'
